attributes.action: Offer Jobs In State-Owned Companies To Anyone Who Has Been Forced Onto Benefits For More Than 6 Months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I Would Like The Prime Minister To Implement A System Wherein A Person Forced Onto Jobseekers Allowance Or Other Similar Benefits And Has Been Unable To Get Employment For 6 Months Will Be Assessed For Suitability At Various State-Owned Firms And Offered A Placement If They Are Suitable For Any (For Example, An Ex-Welder May Be Given A Job On A State Bridge Construction Project). 

This Would Not Only Allow A Person To Keep Their Sense Of Pride, But Give The Person Valuable Work Experience Which May Aid Them In Getting A Job. It Would Also Show Who Is More Commited To Work, As Well As Strengthening The Circulation Of Money.
